title: BioToilet System
description: An innovative environmental solution that processes human waste to generate clean cooking gas while promoting ecological sustainability.

specifications.Sustainability: Reduces reliance on traditional energy sources

detailedDescription: The BioToilet project in Beit Fajjar Public Park introduces a natural and safe method of treating human waste to produce clean cooking gas. This sustainable system improves living conditions and reduces dependency on conventional energy resources, while fostering environmental awareness and preservation.

title: Educational Environmental Classroom
description: An integrated environmental classroom combining biogas, aquaponics, and traditional agriculture at St. George School in Ramallah, Palestine.

specifications.Biogas System: Small-scale anaerobic digester for educational use

features: NFT and Dutch bucket hydroponic systems
detailedDescription: This hands-on environmental classroom at St. George School introduces students to sustainable technologies including biogas energy generation, aquaponics farming (using both NFT and Dutch bucket systems), traditional agriculture, composting of organic waste, and seed incubation through a nursery. The space encourages experiential learning around food production, waste management, and renewable energy.

title: Educational Environmental Classroom - Friends School
description: An educational environmental unit integrating biogas, hydroponics, and organic farming systems in Friends School, Ramallah.

specifications.Biogas System: Processes organic waste to produce cooking gas
specifications.Hydroponics (NFT): Soilless cultivation using nutrient film technique
specifications.Composter: Biological composting unit for waste recycling
specifications.Seed Incubator: Mini nursery for seedlings and educational use

features: Suitable for student learning and workshops
detailedDescription: This eco-friendly educational classroom at Friends School in Ramallah combines multiple green technologies into a learning platform. It includes a biogas system for processing organic waste and producing cooking gas, a hydroponic NFT setup for efficient water-based agriculture, traditional soil farming plots, a composting unit to manage biodegradable waste, and a seed nursery. The project offers students a practical understanding of sustainability, clean energy, and food security.

title: Educational Environmental Classroom - Al-Mustaqbal School
description: An educational environmental unit integrating biogas, hydroponics, and organic farming systems in Al-Mustaqbal School, Ramallah.

specifications.Biogas System: Processes organic waste to produce cooking gas
specifications.Hydroponics (NFT): Soilless cultivation using nutrient film technique
specifications.Composter: Biological composting unit for waste recycling
specifications.Seed Incubator: Mini nursery for seedlings and educational use

features: Suitable for student learning and workshops
detailedDescription: This eco-friendly educational classroom at Al-Mustaqbal School in Ramallah combines multiple green technologies into a learning platform. It includes a biogas system for processing organic waste and producing cooking gas, a hydroponic NFT setup for efficient water-based agriculture, traditional soil farming plots, a composting unit to manage biodegradable waste, and a seed nursery. The project offers students a practical understanding of sustainability, clean energy, and food security.

title: Residential Solar Installation
description: A comprehensive solar solution for a 20-unit residential complex with battery storage.
detailedDescription: This residential solar project provides clean energy to 20 apartment units with advanced battery storage for energy independence. The system includes smart energy management that optimizes power usage and storage, reducing electricity costs for residents by up to 80%.

title: Eco-Tourism Resort
description: A self-sustainable resort with integrated renewable energy systems and green building practices.
detailedDescription: This eco-tourism resort demonstrates how luxury hospitality can be completely sustainable. The resort operates entirely on renewable energy and features innovative water recycling systems, organic waste processing, and buildings constructed with local, sustainable materials that blend harmoniously with the natural environment.

title: NFT & Dutch Bucket Hydroponic System
description: A smart hydroponic farming system combining NFT and Dutch Bucket techniques for efficient, soil-free cultivation using recycled water and nutrient-rich solutions.
detailedDescription: This innovative urban hydroponic farm maximizes food production in minimal space. Using vertical growing techniques and precision agriculture technology, the facility produces fresh vegetables year-round with 95% less water than traditional farming methods. The controlled environment ensures optimal growing conditions and eliminates the need for pesticides.
